Navajo Environmental Agency
members.

revitalization

there's a growing concern

the controversy of historical
precedence happened

There are uncertainties

bring in scientists

a screen shot, a
shot in time of what

they will be able

The uranium mining activities
that are being taken

opposition to such views.

reason why proper rules

and regulations were ignored is
the fact that these people were

not actually involved in the
development of these rules
and regulations.

a false dichotomy

between scientific knowledge
and local knowledge that

actually, where people
think that scientists

are the only ones

been trained in this area

the fact that people

barrier is crossed,

that people, given
their critical thinking

reasoning skills,

trained scientists

So ultimately, how should we
ensure that local knowledge is
taken seriously?
How should we incorporate this?
This involves a mindset shift.

Local knowledge does not seek
to supplant scientific knowledge
but rather strengthen it.

We need to move away

and allow locals and

that boundary workers be

hired to actually take

side of the boundary.

people, locals who

not only understand the

the local culture.

high standards have

to be expected of the
presentation and gathering

standard, these high standards

are enforced on
our local knowledge

will they be taken
seriously by the scientists.

And ultimately,
this entire process

elements inherent

to avoid the events that

one way of doing that

in local knowledge.

Not as a form of opposition
